text.data:
Palpaleos: It's over... All of it... The legend we dreamed of... It has all ended... But, you're no longer here... Sauzer...
What you sought wasn't really war, it was peace, wasn't it?
...I get that feeling... Sauzer...[end]G

Palpaleos: [character][0x1]... I will stay by myself in Granbelos.
Even though the war has ended, I cannot show my face in Kahna... Forgive me... However, you have excellent friends... You aren't lonely, are you?[end]I
Goodbye, legend of the Holy Dragons...[end]P
Palpaleos! You're the one who got us all into that damn war![end]S
So how're you gonna take responsibility for it?![end]P
Palpaleos: So that you are satisfied... Do as you wish...[end]S
Shit! Tryin' to show off, huh?! This knife'll take care of that![end][end]
